name: Security: Load Security Domain
description: Allows user to load/inquiry security domain

name: Security: Bypass Dimension Filtering Rules
description: Allows to bypass dimension filtering and read/write entities without security restrictions

name: Security: Manage Domain
description: Allows to create a Security Domain

name: Security: Manage Access Profile
description: Allows to create an Access Profile

name: Security: Manage User
description: Allows to create a User that has access to a system

name: Security: Manage User Profile
description: Allows to create a User Profile

name: Security: Manage Operational Assignment
description: Allows to create an Operational Assignment

name: Security: Manage Configured Access Profile
description: Allows to create a Configured User Profile

name: Optimistic Lock Override
description: Allows to update existing entities without providing existing timestamp

name: Read-only Override
description: Allows to update existing entities without providing existing timestamp
